title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI Pioneers: Shipping Transformative GenAI Architectures to Production (SMB301)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI先锋：将变革性生成式AI架构交付到生产环境 (SMB301)
abstract: Join our session to discover production-ready generative architectures AI pioneers leverage to ship tomorrow’s customer experiences and transform industries with lean teams, constrained budgets but accelerated timelines. You’ll learn how to apply the platform mindset and AWS Generative AI services - Amazon Q, Amazon Bedrock, and Amazon SageMaker and integrate them with other AWS services to deliver both agentic and non-agentic workloads at scale that stay secure, cost-efficient, and aligned with responsible-AI guardrails. Leave with actionable patterns and inspiration that you can use in your own organizations to scale Generative AI workloads.
abstract_cn: 加入我们的会议，探索AI先锋们利用的生产就绪型生成式架构，以精简团队、有限预算但加速的时间表交付未来的客户体验并改变行业。您将学习如何应用平台思维和AWS生成式AI服务——Amazon Q、Amazon Bedrock和Amazon SageMaker，并将它们与其他AWS服务集成，以大规模交付代理型和非代理型工作负载，同时保持安全、成本效益和符合负责任AI的护栏。您将获得可在自己组织中用于扩展生成式AI工作负载的可操作模式和灵感。
